full_summary:
### Government Tender Invitation for Two Identity Laser Engravers 

**Notice Number:** cb-26-17391180

**Tender Closing Date:** April 22, 2024, 14:00:00

**Title:** Invitation to Tender for Two (2) Identity Laser Engravers

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing an Invitation to Tender for the procurement of two (2) Identity Laser Engravers. This procurement falls under the purview of the Director General Defence Security (DGDS).

**Key Requirements:**

- **UNSPSC Code:** 27112718 Engravers
- **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Delivery Address:** Department of National Defence, Pearkes Building, 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Evaluation Criteria:**
- **Price:** The lowest evaluated price will be the determining factor for the contract award.

**Trade Agreements:**
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPeFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CAIFTA)

**Security Clearance:**
This contract includes a security requirement. Bidders must adhere to the security protocols outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Bid Submission Guidelines:**

- **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
- **Format:** Bidders must refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) for detailed submission guidelines.

**Contact Information:**
To inquire about this tender, please contact Tatyana Vasilchuk at: tatyana.vasilchuk@forces.gc.ca or 00000000.

**Important Dates:**

- **Publication Date:** March 18, 2024
- **Amendment Date:** April 22, 2024
- **Tender Status:** Expired (Note: This is a default setting when the tender is published)

All submissions must adhere to the guidelines outlined in the solicitation documents. Failure to comply with these guidelines may result in the bidder being disqualified from the tender process. 

Please refer to the attached solicitation documents for further information and to submit your bid. 

**Attachments
